body.name: Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy 10X Duty Laundry Detergent Liquid Soap, Original Scent, 37 Fl Oz, 24 Loads, He Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 29 mins
features: Innovative liquid detergent technology gets between the fibers to clean hidden dirt
Designed with 10 concentrated cleaning actives to remove visible and invisible
Provides a deep, hygienic clean even in case of tough stains
Works in all machines and water conditions
Try Tide Power PODS for 50% more cleaning power vs. Tide Original Liquid
body.description: Everything leaves a trace on your clothes - from what you eat, to where you go, to what you do. But more often than not, the dirt residue and the body soils left on your garments aren't necessarily visible and just because you can't see it, doesn't mean it isn't there. Designed to clean fabrics down to the microscopic level, Tide Hygienic Clean Heavy 10x Duty liquid laundry detergent removes both visible and invisible dirt from your garments, giving you a clean you can trust.Containing 10 concentrated cleaning actives, Tide Heavy Duty Hygienic Clean is not only the #1 Stain and Odor Fighter detergent*, it also gets between fibers to clean hidden dirt you didn't even know was there.Available in Tide's beloved Original scent that infuses your loads of laundry with floral and fruity notes.In times of great uncertainty, get a clean you can be certain about: Get a Tide Heavy Duty Hygienic Clean! *among liquid laundry detergents

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Outstanding cleaning and stain removal. Contains more cleaning ingredients, less water. A low-sudsing detergent that provides great cleaning performance in high efficiency machines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This detergent is one of my favorites. It cleans everything off of all my laundry. Even cleans all the grime and shop scent from my husband's manufacturing work clothes. Somehow it also makes the scent from any fabric sheets actually stick and keep my clothes smelling nice for many days after washing them 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only thing I use to wash hospital scrubs
reviews.reviewText: My partner and I both work in healthcare and wear scrubs (non-hospital issued) to work. I have been using this detergent exclusively just when washing our scrubs on the highest and longest settings and have been very pleased with how effectively it cleans without fading the color. The smell is not overwhelming and is subtle enough for our work setting. I have also purchased this item in the lavender and unscented options with similar reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Great Price, but deal breaker... Horrible Shipping!!
reviews.reviewText: I really loved that this product was available for subscribe and save. It's a really great value and I was excited to have it on auto-deliver. After 6 purchases, I'm cancelling my subscription due to persistent shipping issues. The bottle was regularly placed loose in a large package with other items-even food items! The lid was never secured and it would come loose and leak every time. 3 times were minimal and easy to clean up. Twice I had to call and get the entire box refunded due to most of the bottle spilling and ruining food items and paper products. This last time, it caused so much damage to the box that it was determined to be undeliverable by UPS and I had to call customer service to get the items refunded and then purchase all of my subscribe and save items separately without the subscribe and save discount. It was a really unreasonable situation and I would strongly recommend skipping the subscribe and save option and purchasing the item separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong
reviews.reviewText: It does what it claims, nothing more to add.The regular scent is fine, if you like scented I suspect it will be 100% what you expect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for removing stains
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product for Removing so stains from some clothes.l have used this in the past and it works great. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaves clothes soft and love the scent
reviews.reviewText: I have never used tide before because it is so pricey. However I may switch. My clothes feel so soft and smell amazing. I wish it weren’t so pricey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tide Or Persil? Depends on Which Smells Better To You.
reviews.reviewText: Updated review November 19, 2003:I feel its important to update a review when I find out I was wrong. Well, I was wrong in thinking I was ripped off because there was not 1090 ML as adevertised on the label. Actually, I ran out of this detergent yesterday and I used about 1320ML. That's actually 230 MORE millileters than stated on the bottle!!!The ONLY detergent that gets out tough stains better than this stuff is Persil. And the difference is very very very small. So small I miight even be just umagining there is a difference when there is none really. I have seen a study that said Persil is 2% better so, I might be influenced by that study.I think I perfer Persil because the smell of the washed clothese is better than Tide. Other than that reason, Tide is the clear winner based on value and performance for value..So, I change my rating to 5 stars from 3.Original July 29 review:The container I received is about 3/4 full.OK, so I've used Tide PODS for a long time and I admit this is the first time I've ever bought the liquid jug. So, maybe the jug is supposed to come 3/4 full. But if that is so, it's a waste of plastic, since its not like a powdered product which "settles" during shipping.Maybe it was properly shipped and I got the full amount. Maybe it got turned on its side and 25% of it leaked out. I don't know.I do NOT believe there are 37 FL ounces (1090 ML) of Tide detergent in the container that was delivered to me, on July 27 from Amazon. I measure my detergent in a shot glass, before pouring it into the dispenser. I usually use 1 ounce (30ml). But sometimes I use 1/2 ounce (15ml), Tide does work so well that I can get away with such a small amount. I'm keeping a log of the usage of this container and I'm really confident its NOT going to add up .I average 4.5 loads a week. So, this Tide should last me somewhere between 8 to 16 weeks. Again, I am keeping a log. I will come back and update this message when the container is finished.So what I am saying is, I will not be buying Tide from Amazon until I can confirm I didn't get ripped off. Nothing against Tide, it works great, but I'm convinced that some of the product was removed from my container before it got to me, either accidently or otherwise.Value For Money: 3(Will upgrade to 5, IF it turns out I got at least 1060ML of product.For Sensitive Skin: 5I've never had a problem with Tide, nor has anybody I've ever known.Scent: 2I really hate the scent. I know the majority of the world grew up on this scent. But personally I always regret doing that first wash because I always forget to try a different scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Who doesn't love a great detergent and a decent price?!
